description:
As a MERN Stack Developer, you will be responsible for:


Front-end Development:

    • Building dynamic and interactive user interfaces using React.js.
    • Creating reusable components, managing state using hooks and context, and implementing routing with React Router.
    • Integrating front-end components with RESTful APIs and ensuring a seamless user experience across multiple devices.
    • Optimizing application performance and ensuring responsive design.

Back-end Development:

    • Developing and maintaining server-side applications with Node.js and Express.js.
    • Designing and implementing RESTful APIs to enable communication between front-end and back-end services.
    • Ensuring proper error handling, data validation, and security practices for APIs.

Database Management:

    • Designing, managing, and interacting with MongoDB databases, including creating models, queries, and data aggregation.
    • Optimizing database performance and implementing best practices for data storage and retrieval.

Collaborative Development:

    • Working closely with front-end and back-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
    • Collaborating with UI/UX designers to implement visually appealing and functional applications.
    • Using version control tools like Git for managing and collaborating on code.

Deployment & Maintenance:

    • Deploying applications to cloud platforms such as AWS, Heroku, or DigitalOcean.
    • Writing unit tests and performing debugging to ensure the functionality and security of applications.
    • Maintaining and updating existing applications as required, ensuring scalability and performance improvements.

Continuous Improvement:

    • Keeping up to date with the latest developments in the MERN stack and other technologies.
    • Identifying areas for improvement in the development process and proposing solutions.
    • Participating in code reviews to ensure code quality and consistency.

Qualifications:

  • Experience:
    • Proven experience in full-stack web development with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js).
    • Strong proficiency in JavaScript and experience with ES6+ features.
    • Familiarity with front-end development frameworks such as React.js, including hooks, state management (e.g., Redux), and component-based architecture.
    • Experience building RESTful APIs and working with Express.js and Node.js.
    • Solid understanding of database design and experience with MongoDB.
    • Experience with Git and version control.
    • Knowledge of deploying and maintaining applications on platforms like AWS, Heroku, or DigitalOcean.

  • Skills:
    • Strong understanding of web development best practices and design patterns.
    • Familiarity with authentication and authorization mechanisms (e.g., JWT, OAuth).
    • Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
    • Knowledge of Agile development methodologies.
    • Good communication and teamwork skills.

Primary skill - React.js, Nextjs, HTML5. CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), Redux,


Secondary skill - RESTful APIs, TypeScript, Next.js, Git, DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines.

- 3+ years- experience developing with ReactJS and React Native

- Strong Fundamental JavaScript skills (ES5 and ES6).

- Experience with TypeScript or ClojureScript is a plus

- Strong Fundamental CSS skills.

- Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles

- React combined with Flux/Redux experience is preferred.

- Experience with data structure libraries

- Knowledgeable in cross

-browser compatibility issues.

- Understands modern web standards and modular patterns.

- Experience developing component-driven UIs.

- Fluency in best practices for HTML5, CSS and Javascript framework / libraries.

- Great communication, solid collaboration skills, with strong teamwork ethic.

- Experience with data driven dashboards a plus.

- Experience developing responsive, single page, event driven web applications.

- Self-driven and capable of managing multiple priorities under pressure and ambiguity.

- Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment.

- Keen eye for usability, creating intuitive visually appealing experiences.

- Strong grasp of DOM structure and layout techniques.

- Experience with CSS preprocessors (Sass or Less).

- Experience developing/implementing CSS animations driven by window events and user interactions.

- Good grasp of cross

-browser compatibility issues.

- Knowledgeable in performance optimization techniques.

- Familiar with NPM dependency package management.

- Familiarity with RESTful APIs

- Familiar with MongoDB or Oracle.

- Proficient with GIT source control.

- Comfortable with agile/scrum development methodology.

- A sense of pride in building clean UIs that users enjoy interacting with and engineers enjoy maintaining.

- Experience with automated testing

Primary Skills

  • Programming skills and experience in React JS, HTML5, JavaScript, CSS
  • Experience in client-side programming
  • Good communication skill to collaborate and deliver in a globally distributed team
  • Design and implement solutions that provide optimal and innovative ways of addressing customer needs

Secondary Skills

  • Experience in RESTful APIs
  • Ability to empathize with customer pain points, understand their requirements / gaps
  • Ability to quickly isolate problem areas and trouble-shoot a given situation systematically
  • A team player who can learn tools, technologies, processes, people quickly and thrive working within a high-performance team

To deliver on our ambitious product roadmap and continue to provide excellent levels of service to our customer base, we are growing our global software development team. This position is for a full-time software developer; the individual will be an integral part of product development, designing and implementing high quality product enhancements.


We are looking for a team player who can learn tools, technologies & processes quickly and thrives working within a high-performance team, someone with a passion for solving customer issues coupled with great attitude and good communication skills.


HCL Software is a division of HCL Technologies (HCL) that operates its primary software business. We develop, market, sell, and support over 20 product families in the areas of Customer Experience, Digital Solutions, Secure DevOps, Security & Automation

Responsibilities:

  • Tasks/modules assigned under SDLC process to be delivered on time.

Cinch is fastest growing tech subscription platform in APAC. We are looking for an experienced Frontend Engineer with expertise in Next.js, ReactJS and Typescript.


What You Will Be Doing

  • Build high-traffic web applications with Next.js, ReactJS & TypeScript.
  • Engage in decisions ranging from UI Design to Frontend architecture.
  • Build beautiful and highly interactive user interfaces.
  • Analyze website performance and implement enhancements.
  • Analyze user analytics and suggest feature improvements and experiments.

What We Need to See

  • 3+ years of frontend experience
  • Excellent coding skills in ReactJs and Typescript.
  • Experience with Next.js.
  • Experience in creating Unit and End-to-End tests.
  • Good technical understanding of RESTful APIs.
  • Passionate about writing well-structured, efficient, and maintainable code, actively keeping the quality of the code base in check
  • Excellent teamwork and communication skills.

Roles and Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, test, and maintain frontend applications using Angular, React.js, React Native, Flutter, Vue.js, Ionic Framework, and Bootstrap.
  • Troubleshoot issues related to application performance optimization and debugging.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
  • Participate in code reviews to improve overall quality of the product.

Education: B.E. Computer Science/IT degree (or any other engineering discipline)

Experience: 4 + years

Work timings: 2:00 PM to 11:00 PM IST

Position Requirements:

  • Highly proficient with the HTML, CSS with experience in building responsive templates/ components
  • Experience with Vue.js framework and proficiency in its core principles such as components, reactivity, and the virtual DOM
  • Experience in supporting vue3 extension for all components
  • Ability to work on individual modules to incorporate into the site using module manager
  • Good understanding of JavaScript, ES6 and SASS
  • Understanding of server-side rendering and its benefits and use cases
  • Knowledge of functional programming and object-oriented programming paradigms
  • Ability to write efficient, secure, well-documented, and clean JavaScript code
  • Working experience in JavaScript/Typescript with event based chaining - Work experience on building npm modules or libraries is good to have
  • Expertise in webpack /babel/gulp

Role & Responsibilities:

  • Developing responsive templates/components with HTML and CSS
  • Support vue3 extension for all components
  • Work on migration of O&O runtime in .NET MVC to the Vue.js framework
  • Developing user-facing applications using Vue.js
  • Staying up to date with all recent developments in the JavaScript and Vue.js space

Responsibilities:
Design develop React & NodeJS based applications

Required Skills:
4+ years of strong experience in HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, NodeJS technologies.

Must have experience in developing typescript.
Experience in integrating Web components.

Knowledge of REST APIs and asynchronous request handling.  
Strong Object-Oriented design skills and understanding of SOLID Principles.
Development and implementation of features Experience developing applications with Agile team methodologies preferred.
Sufficient experience with Git, SVN  to organize a large software project with multiple developers to include branching, tagging and merging.
Must have knowledge of developing Responsive Web Applications.
Excellent communications and interpersonal skills.
Strong debugging skills.
Good to have domain knowledge in Industrial automation.
Experience with testing frameworks for UI testing.

Preferred Qualifications:
Bachelors degree in Computer Science or a related field.

Design and develop the user interface of websites and web applications, ensuring a visually appealing and user-friendly experience.
Write clean and semantically structured HTML and CSS code to create web page layouts and styles that are responsive and cross-browser compatible.
Ability to produce visual design same as mock-up screen using modern HTML & CSS
Develop and maintain web applications using Angular, including components, services, and modules.
Implement responsive design techniques to ensure websites work seamlessly across various screen sizes and devices.
Ensure that web pages function consistently on different web browsers and address any compatibility issues that may arise.
Work closely with designers, back-end developers, and other team members to ensure the seamless integration of front-end components with back-end systems and to deliver a cohesive and functional user experience

Cimpress is looking for Senior Software Engineers across Mumbai and Bengaluru locations.



Job Location: Remote

As a Senior Software engineer, you will join a motivated team focused on building the next-generation platform to deliver on Cimpress's most strategic priorities. The squad you will join is full-stack -- owning an array of microservices deployed on AWS and various front-end tools and components. We are looking for engineers eager to work at all levels of the stack. If you aren't familiar with all levels, don't worry - there will be plenty of learning opportunities available



What You Will Do

  • Be part of a motivated team that is passionate about delivering impactful work to delight our customers.
  • Develop, test, and maintain high-quality software applications.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Use a multitude of open-source projects while exploring and promoting new technologies that create high-quality designs and code.
  • Utilize and contribute to shared software used throughout the company including UX component libraries and service frameworks.
  • Mentor other developers and share a passion for technology with all your teammates.
  • Contribute to a continuously improving software development process emphasizing agile development, cohesive teams, and highly engaged code review.
  • Contribute to the overall architecture and technical direction of the projects.


Qualifications:

At Cimpress, we value the experiences that individual team members add to our culture. Please don't hesitate to apply even if you don't meet the exact qualifications, we look forward to learning more about you!

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience and/or training.
  • Proficiency in NodeJS programming development language. If not expertise in Node.JS - should be good at Java/C# and open to explore new technologies
  • Proficiency in at least one scripting language, with JavaScript/Typescript preferred.Ability to contribute at multiple levels of our stack.
  • Experience modern software development and a desire to write (and review) code every day
  • Ability to excel on a highly talented team in a fast-paced environment
  • Good with Low-Level Design, experience with HLD is a plus
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
  • Knowledge of DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines.
  • At least 4-6 years of modern web development experience.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • A strong desire for self-improvement, and an aim to control your own learning.

Senior Software Engineer I
Pune/Mumbai/Bangalore (Hybrid)

General Summary:

The Senior Software Engineer I is responsible for developing high-quality, innovative, fully performing software in compliance with coding standards. This individual works in partnership with cross-functional teams to ensure that software deliverables, including designs, codes, and tests, are completed in a timely manner, while remaining aligned with industry and organizational standards.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:

  • Provides support to the Engineering teams, with a high attention to detail
  • Researches, analyzes, and documents findings
  • May influence others within the Software Engineering team through the explanation of facts, policies, and; practices
  • Designs, builds, and maintains large-scale production services, web applications, data pipelines, and; streaming systems
  • Works on systems critical to companys current and future operations
  • Debugs production issues across services and multiple levels of the stack
  • Assists with improvement of organizational engineering standards, tooling, and processes
  • Participates in the testing process through test review and analysis, test witnessing, and certification of; software
  • Evaluates codes to ensure validity, proper structure, alignment with industry standards, and compatibility; with operating systems;
  • Maintains an understanding of current technologies or programming practices through continuing; education, reading or participation in professional conferences, workshops, and/or groups

    • Knowledge, Skills, and/or Abilities Required:;;

  • Ability to work constructively and independently under stress and pressure in a fast paced, multi-tasking environment
  • Front end knowledge (React JS, JavaScript);
  • Back-end scripting (C#.net & Vb.net)
  • Database (MySQL, SQL)
  • Ability to interact positively and openly with colleagues and external business contacts, with strong verbal; and written communication skills
  • Knowledge of programming languages and software basics;
  • Knowledge of relevant software development tools including version control, build processes, debuggers,; and test frameworks

    • Educational/Vocational/Previous Experience Recommendations:

    • Bachelors degree in related field or equivalent business experience
    • 3+ years of relevant experience

Are you passionate about technology and eager to dive into the world of software development? At Anarock, we're a young and dynamic team that believes in moving fast, shipping often, and learning from our mistakes.
We're looking for a Software Engineer Intern who is driven, curious, and ready to take on challenges headfirst. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment and have a burning desire to learn and grow, we'd love to have you on board.

What You'll Do
  • Collaborate with our engineering team on real-world projects, contributing to product development and feature enhancements.
  • Get hands-on experience with coding, debugging, and testing software across various platforms.
  • Participate in daily stand-ups, code reviews, and brainstorming sessions.
  • Learn and apply best practices in software engineering, including agile methodologies and continuous integration.

What We're Looking For
  • Strong enthusiasm for technology and software development.
  • Basic understanding of programming languages like Ruby, Python or Javascript.
  • Familiarity with web development frameworks or libraries is a plus.
  • Problem-solving mindset with a willingness to tackle new challenges.
  • Excellent communication skills and a collaborative attitude.
  • Eagerness to learn quickly and adapt to new technologies and tools.

Why You'll Love It Here:
  • A vibrant and supportive team that values innovation and creativity.
  • An opportunity to work on impactful projects and see your contributions come to life.
  • Mentorship from experienced engineers and exposure to the latest industry practices.
  • A culture that encourages experimentation and learning from failures.
If you're ready to kickstart your career in tech and make a difference, apply now and join us on this exciting journey!
Job Requirement
  • Basic Programming Knowledge: You should have a good grasp of at least one programming language, like Python, Ruby or Javascript. We don't expect you to be an expert, but knowing the basics is key.
  • Curiosity for Web Development: If you've dabbled with HTML, CSS, or JavaScript, that's great! Familiarity with any web development frameworks is a bonus, but not mandatory.
  • Problem-Solving Attitude: You enjoy figuring things out, even when the path isn't clear. We're here to help, but we love it when you try to solve challenges on your own first.
  • Team Player: Collaboration is a big part of what we do. We value your input, and we want you to feel comfortable working closely with others.
  • Eager Learner: We're moving fast, and so will you. A willingness to learn and adapt to new tools and technologies is crucial.
  • Good Communication: Whether it's asking questions or sharing ideas, being able to communicate clearly and effectively is something we really appreciate.

We re seeking enthusiastic, early-career Front-End Developers to join our growing team. You will work alongside experienced developers, contributing to the development and enhancement of our web and mobile applications.

Job Description

We are seeking a skilled and motivated Front-End Developer to join our dynamic development team. The ideal candidate will have a strong proficiency in React, Material-UI, Redux, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining user-facing features, ensuring the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs, and optimizing applications for maximum speed and scalability.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and Maintain User Interfaces:
  • Build responsive and intuitive user interfaces using React and Material-UI.
  • Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs provided by designers.
  • State Management:
  • Implement and manage application state using Redux.
  • Maintain consistent state across the application, ensuring a smooth and performant user experience.
  • Web Technologies:
  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code in JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3.
  • Ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness.
  • Collaboration:
  • Work closely with back-end developers to integrate APIs and other services.
  • Collaborate with designers to translate UI/UX wireframes into high-quality code.
  • Optimization:
  • Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
  • Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
  • Best Practices:
  • Follow and enforce best practices and coding standards.
  • Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to peers.

Qualifications:

  • Education:
  • Bachelor's degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
  • Experience:
  • Proven experience as a Front-End Developer or similar role.
  • Strong portfolio of web development projects.
  • Technical Skills:
  • Proficiency in React and Material-UI.
  • Strong experience with Redux for state management.
  • Solid understanding of JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3.
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling.
  • Additional Skills:
  • Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git).
  • Knowledge of modern front-end build pipelines and tools.
  • Ability to write unit tests and functional tests.

Soft Skills:

  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Strong organizational and time management skills.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with TypeScript.
  • Familiarity with agile development methodologies.
  • Experience with performance tuning and optimization techniques.
  • Understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that application will adhere to them.

Greeting of the day, Looking for Frontend Developer SDE 2


Key Attributes and Responsibilities:


  • Work closely with design, backend development teams, and other stakeholders to translate wireframes and mockups into interactive, responsive web pages.
  • Engage and collaborate with stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver solutions that meet business needs.
  • Develop new user-facing features and optimize existing ones using React.js (version 18 and above) and Next.js or similar frameworks and Typescript.
  • Write high-quality, clean, and maintainable code with a strong emphasis on performance and SEO best practices.
  • Implement front-end best practices to ensure excellent Lighthouse scores and overall search engine visibility.
  • Ensure cross-browser and cross-device compatibility of the website.
  • Enhance application responsiveness and overall user experience.
  • Optimize web pages for maximum speed and scalability.
  • Stay up to date with the latest front-end technologies, trends, and best practices to continuously improve our development processes.
  • Collaborate with other team members to identify and address performance bottlenecks and UI/UX issues.
  • Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
  • Write and maintain unit tests to ensure the reliability and robustness of the codebase.
  • Utilize Docker and Kubernetes for containerization and orchestration.
  • Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.

Technical Requirements (Must Have):


  • Strong expertise in React.js (version 18 and above).
  • Experience with Next.js is highly preferred.
  • Knowledge of Node.js.
  • Well-versed in TypeScript and proficient in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
  • Familiarity with responsive design principles and mobile-first development.
  • Demonstrated ability to write high-performance code that positively impacts SEO and Lighthouse scores.
  • Solid understanding of front-end build tools, such as Webpack or Parcel.
  • Experience in writing unit test cases (e.g., Jest, Mocha).
  • Understanding of RESTful APIs and web services.
  • Proficient in version control using Git.
  • Experience in Docker and Kubernetes.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills.

Technical Requirements (Good to Have):


  • Experience in MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, ReactJs, Node.js)
  • Familiarity with tools like New Relic, Coralogix, Grafana.
  • Understanding of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms such as GCP, Azure, AWS.
  • Experience with GraphQL.

Interested candidate can apply here.

Roles and Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, test, and deploy scalable and maintainable frontend applications using ReactJS.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify requirements and implement solutions that meet business needs.
  • Ensure high-quality code by writing unit tests, integrating with REST APIs, and following best practices for coding standards.
  • Participate in code reviews to improve overall quality of the application.
  • Troubleshoot issues related to UI bugs, performance optimization, and compatibility across different browsers.

jobTitle: Opening For Node Js+ React Js Developer @ PureSoftware

Hello,


Greetings from The Gateway Group !!


About Company:

The Gateway Corp, a privately held global enterprise since 1997, is headquartered in India and The Netherlands. The Gateway Corp is the principal holding company and promoter of all Gateway Group Companies, comprising 20 independent operating companies across 15 countries.


Company URL - https://www.thegatewaycorp.com


Perks and Benefits:

  • Fast-track your growth and up-gradate to the next level when you are ready
  • Short Term/Long Term Onsite opportunities
  • Flexi shifts policies to strike a perfect work-life balance
  • Track your appraisal in real-time with a 100% transparent appraisal system

Why should you join us?

  • Debt-free Free, financially stable company, Since 1997.
  • No salary deductions, no layoffs, no clients lost in the Pandemic Year
  • Technical & Functional Growth of an Individual
  • More than 60% of our teams are upgraded to the latest Tech/Trends every year
  • Close to home offices
  • Best human practices, Audited and certified by INTERTEK (EXTERNAL AGENCY)
  • Celebrating motherhood policies beyond the law of the land supporting our colleagues for up to 2 years.

Job Description:-

We are seeking a skilled and passionate Front-End Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in front-end technologies and a keen eye for detail, with the ability to create intuitive and responsive web applications.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain user-facing features using Vanilla JavaScript, jQuery, and modern JavaScript frameworks.
  • Create responsive web designs using HTML5, SCSS, and Bootstrap.
  • Implement ES6 features and best practices to improve the performance and maintainability of code.
  • Utilize version control systems, particularly Git, to manage and collaborate on codebases.
  • Conduct unit testing and debugging to ensure high-quality and bug-free applications.
  • Leverage browser developer tools to optimize front-end performance and troubleshoot issues.

Must-Have Skills:

  • Proficiency in Vanilla JavaScript and jQuery.
  • Experience with Bootstrap and TypeScript.
  • Expertise in one or more modern JavaScript frameworks such as Svelte, Astro, Angular 6+, ReactJS, or Vue.js.
  • Strong knowledge of HTML5 and SCSS.
  • Understanding of the principles of responsive design.
  • Familiarity with ES6 features.
  • Experience with version control systems, particularly Git.
  • Skills in unit testing and debugging.
  • Proficiency with browser developer tools.

Good-to-Have Skills:

  • Experience with cross-browser development.
  • Familiarity with content management systems.
  • Knowledge of RESTful services and APIs.
  • Basic understanding of Node.js and MongoDB.
  • Experience working in an Agile-Scrum methodology.

Roles and Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, test, and maintain scalable and efficient frontend applications using Angular (version 12+) framework.
  • Expereince in developing custom UI libraries
  • Should have worked as Frontend Developer
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify requirements and implement solutions that meet business needs.
  • Ensure high-quality code by following best practices, coding standards, and testing methodologies.
  • Participate in code reviews to improve overall quality of the application.
  • Troubleshoot issues related to frontend development.

Desired Candidate Profile

  • 4-9 years of experience in Angular development with expertise in latest Angular version.
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or relevant field (BCA/B.Tech/B.E.).
  • Strong understanding of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript programming languages.
  • Experience working with REST APIs from the client-side.
  • Should be immediately available to join

Job Summary:

We are seeking a talented full-stack developer to join our team. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of backend development, database management, and integration of applications, with at least 3 years experience in React & great command on Javascript. You would be working on React, Progressive web apps, SEO, performance & security optimisation & some infusion of NodeJs.

  • Identify and fix any bugs or performance issues discovered.

Peer code reviews

  • Building your frontend capability in complex problems and expanding your horizon of technologies

  • .Proven work experience as a Full-stack Developer.
  • Strong proficiency in backend development languages such as Python, Java, or Node.js.
  • In depth knowledge of Javascript, great conceptual clarity
  • Great understanding of data structures
  • Great with HTML and CSS (Sass or Less)
  • Experience with database management systems, such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB

Position: Software Engineer

Experience: 3-4 years

Department: Engineering


Job Summary:

We are looking for a talented Software Engineer with a passion for Full Stack development using the MERN stack and AWS technologies. The ideal candidate will have 3 years of experience in developing dynamic web applications and services. As a Software Engineer, you will work closely with senior engineers and contribute to the design, development, and maintenance of our web-based solutions.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain web applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js).
  • Assist in the development and deployment of serverless applications on AWS using Lambda, SQS, S3, EventBridge, and API Gateway.
  • Work with relational and NoSQL databases such as MySQL and DynamoDB to ensure efficient data storage and retrieval.
  • Implement and manage messaging systems using Kafka.
  • Collaborate with team members to define, design, and implement new features.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
  • Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback.
  • Debug and resolve technical issues in a timely manner.
  • Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes and tools.
  • Stay current with industry trends and advancements in technology.

Qualifications:

  • 3 years of professional experience in Full Stack development using the MERN stack.
  • Familiarity with AWS services such as Lambda, SQS, S3, EventBridge, and API Gateway.
  • Experience with relational and NoSQL databases such as MySQL and DynamoDB.
  • Familiarity with messaging systems like Kafka.
  • Proficiency in front-end technologies including HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript frameworks (React.js).
  • Experience with server-side technologies and frameworks (Node.js, Express.js).
  • Understanding of RESTful APIs and microservices architecture.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Good communication and teamwork skills.
  • Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.

About Persistent

We are a trusted Digital Engineering and Enterprise Modernization partner, combining deep technical expertise and industry experience to help our clients anticipate what’s next. Our offerings and proven solutions create a unique competitive advantage for our clients by giving them the power to see beyond and rise above. We work with many industry-leading organizations across the world including 12 of the 30 most innovative US companies, 80% of the largest banks in the US and India, and numerous innovators across the healthcare ecosystem.

Our growth trajectory continues, as we reported $1,231M annual revenue (16% Y-o-Y). Along with our growth, we’ve onboarded over 4900 new employees in the past year, bringing our total employee count to over 23,500+ people located in 19 countries across the globe.

Persistent Ltd. is  dedicated to fostering diversity and inclusion in the workplace. We invite applications from all qualified individuals, including those with disabilities, and regardless of gender or gender preference. We welcome diverse candidates from all backgrounds.

For more details please login to www.persistent.com

About The Position

We are looking for UI Developers to join our team to meet customer demand for innovative, interactive web technologies. You will work closely with other members of the Persistent development team to deliver high quality web application.

What You?ll Do

  • Pick up and drive technical issues, more or less independently, with very little help
  • Execute and develop UI interfaces
  • Proactively analyze bugs and give feedback to Module Leads for defect prevention

Expertise You?ll Bring

  • Expertise with JavaScript based frameworks like AngularJS, BackboneJS, which is a must
  • Good solid understanding of object-oriented JavaScript concepts, HTML5 and CSS along with responsive design
  • Experience in developing single page applications using AngularJS / BackboneJS, RESTful APIs, Node.js
  • Exposure to Node.js will be an added advantage

Benefits

  • Competitive salary and benefits package
  • Culture focused on talent development with quarterly promotion cycles and company-sponsored higher education and certifications
  • Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies
  • Employee engagement initiatives such as project parties, flexible work hours, and Long Service awards
  • Annual health check-ups
  • Insurance coverage: group term life, personal accident, and Mediclaim hospitalization for self, spouse, two children, and parents

Inclusive Environment

•We offer hybrid work options and flexible working hours to accommodate various needs and preferences.

•Our office is equipped with accessible facilities, including adjustable workstations, ergonomic chairs, and assistive technologies to support employees with physical disabilities.

Job Title: Next.js Developer (5+ Years of Experience)
Employment Type: Full-time
Experience Level: Mid-Senior Level


Job Description:


We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Next.js Developer to join our development team. The ideal candidate should have a solid background in building scalable and high-performance web applications using Next.js and React. You will be responsible for developing new features, enhancing existing modules, and ensuring code quality. If you have a passion for cutting-edge technology and a keen interest in building next-generation web applications, wed like to meet you.


Responsibilities:


  • Develop, maintain, and optimize web applications using Next.js.
  • Collaborate with the product team to understand requirements and design technical solutions.
  • Implement responsive, dynamic, and SEO-friendly user interfaces.
  • Integrate RESTful APIs and third-party services.
  • Ensure high-quality, maintainable code by implementing best practices and design patterns.
  • Debug and resolve performance issues to enhance application efficiency.
  • Write and maintain technical documentation.
  • Work closely with designers and backend developers to build cohesive applications.
  • Optimize web applications for maximum speed and scalability.
  • Conduct code reviews and mentor junior developers as needed.

Requirements:


  • 5+ years of professional experience in web development.
  • 4+ years of hands-on experience with Next.js and React.js.
  • Strong proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, and CSS3.
  • In-depth understanding of server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG) concepts in Next.js.
  • Experience with state management libraries (e.g., Redux, Context API).
  • Familiarity with front-end build tools, such as Webpack or Babel.
  • Knowledge of RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and integrating third-party services.
  • Proficiency with TypeScript is a strong plus.
  • Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Vercel) is preferred.
  • Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently.
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

Company Overview: We are focused on delivering cutting-edge digital experiences for our clients. We are looking for an experienced and highly skilled Senior ReactJS / NextJS Developer to join our dynamic team. If you have a passion for developing scalable web applications and possess strong expertise in headless CMS and commerce platforms, we want to hear from you!

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain modern, scalable, and high-performance web applications using ReactJS and NextJS.
  • Lead the design and implementation of headless CMS and e-commerce solutions in collaboration with cross-functional teams.
  • Integrate and manage APIs, particularly from headless CMS platforms (e.g., Contentful, Strapi, Sanity) and commerce solutions (e.g., Shopify, BigCommerce, or custom commerce platforms).
  • Work on server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG) to optimize performance and SEO for the web applications.
  • Architect and implement reusable UI components and libraries.
  • Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs and collaborate with front-end designers.
  • Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and improve application performance.
  • Maintain high code quality and adhere to best practices for development, testing, and deployment.
  • Collaborate with backend developers to integrate various third-party services, APIs, and microservices.
  • Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in the React ecosystem, headless CMS, and e-commerce space.
  • Mentor and provide technical guidance to junior developers.

Required Skills:

  • Strong experience with ReactJS and NextJS, including advanced features like SSR and SSG.
  • Hands-on experience with headless CMS platforms (Contentful, Strapi, Sanity, etc.) and integrating them into modern web applications.
  • Solid understanding of e-commerce platforms (Shopify, BigCommerce, custom solutions) and experience integrating them with front-end applications.
  • Proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, CSS3, and modern JavaScript libraries and frameworks.
  • Experience with API integration, RESTful services, and GraphQL.
  • Knowledge of version control systems, primarily Git.
  • Familiarity with front-end build tools like Webpack, Babel, and NPM/Yarn.
  • Strong debugging and troubleshooting skills.
  • Experience working in an agile environment.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience with TypeScript and state management libraries like Redux or Context API.
  • Knowledge of serverless architectures and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
  • Familiarity with CI/CD processes and tools.
  • Knowledge of PWA (Progressive Web Apps) development.
  • Understanding of SEO principles and web accessibility standards.

Education:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).

Why Join Us?:

  • Work on exciting projects in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Opportunities for growth and advancement within the company.
  • Flexible working hours and remote work options.
  • A collaborative team of skilled professionals.

How to Apply: If you are passionate about developing
